New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 10 月 15 日，星期二 04:15:39 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Gone Fishing case: Stephen Stone given bail after murder convictions quashed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gone-fishing-case-stephen-stone-given-bail-after-murder-convictions-quashed/VFC43GALERGUVJWHJR4ELABWEM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gone-fishing-case-stephen-stone-given-bail-after-murder-convictions-quashed/VFC43GALERGUVJWHJR4ELABWEM/ Stone spent 25 years in prison for the murder of West Auckland tyre-fitter Dean Fuller. Tue, 15 Oct 2024 04:02:17 +0000 Stephen Stone was convicted of the 1989 murder of Dean Fuller-Sandys and the rape and murder of Leah Stephens, inset, but the convictions were quashed by the Court of Appeal.
New hot pools being built at Huka Prawn Park in Taupō https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/new-hot-pools-being-built-at-huka-prawn-park-in-taupo/VRPYRBJ5IREGJBCB2MKWIIQIAUM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/new-hot-pools-being-built-at-huka-prawn-park-in-taupo/VRPYRBJ5IREGJBCB2MKWIIQIAUM/ Dan HutchinsonThe new facilites are for families and will complement the adults-only Wairakei Terraces. Tue, 15 Oct 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Former Huka Prawn Park owner Richard Klein has sold the Taupō site to a new partnership. Photo / Dan Hutchinson
Kiwi Art Trail visits Tauranga CBD, with local artists featured https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/kiwi-art-trail-visits-tauranga-cbd-with-local-artists-featured/PF2XWAYIGZHRNMLRMTHWA6W6RE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/kiwi-art-trail-visits-tauranga-cbd-with-local-artists-featured/PF2XWAYIGZHRNMLRMTHWA6W6RE/ Twenty sculptures of kiwi are dotted around Tauranga's city centre. Department of Conservation catches elusive Norway rat with help of AI-powered cameras https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/department-of-conservation-catches-elusive-norway-rat-with-help-of-ai-powered-cameras/7GDA52CDQRHOFMBT7JC26KSHDE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/department-of-conservation-catches-elusive-norway-rat-with-help-of-ai-powered-cameras/7GDA52CDQRHOFMBT7JC26KSHDE/ The Department of Conservation is using the latest technology to fight predators. Tue, 15 Oct 2024 03:45:42 +0000 A rat caught on camera on Motutapu Island was tracked using an AI-powered thermal camera (inset). Photo / DOC
Four dead after crashes on State Highway 1 in Waiōuru and Marton https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/serious-crash-with-one-person-riticly-injured-on-state-highway-1-south-of-waiouru/TFBOX5ZZQVBWZIWK2VXV4DVITY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/serious-crash-with-one-person-riticly-injured-on-state-highway-1-south-of-waiouru/TFBOX5ZZQVBWZIWK2VXV4DVITY/ Eva de JongFour people have died on North Island roads today, in two separate crashes. Tue, 15 Oct 2024 03:38:02 +0000 At least one person has critical injuries after a crash on State Highway 1, south of Waiōuru. Photo / NZME
One seriously injured after car crashes into ASB bank building in Christchurch https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/car-crashes-into-bank-in-christchurch-one-person-seriously-injured/VXCTJBCBGNF33E5FLDJOJTOSXU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/car-crashes-into-bank-in-christchurch-one-person-seriously-injured/VXCTJBCBGNF33E5FLDJOJTOSXU/ Katie OliverWitness says people are everywhere and 'car is right up on the steps'. Tue, 15 Oct 2024 03:24:53 +0000 One person is seriously injured after a car crashed into a branch of ASB Bank on Riccarton Road, Christchurch. Photo / George Heard
Christopher Luxon and Chris Hipkins go head-to-head in Question Time after dual popularity drop https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/christopher-luxon-and-chris-hipkins-to-battle-in-question-time-after-dual-popularity-drop/773P4U6LJVADJCIJSDROIOBGWQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/christopher-luxon-and-chris-hipkins-to-battle-in-question-time-after-dual-popularity-drop/773P4U6LJVADJCIJSDROIOBGWQ/ Adam PearseIt's the first Question Time since September as MPs had two weeks away from Parliament. Tue, 15 Oct 2024 03:01:39 +0000 Labour's Chris Hipkins and National's Christopher Luxon have dropped in popularity in the latest poll. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Nelson fisherman Darren Bevan jailed after failing to heed final drink-drive warning https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-fisherman-darren-bevan-is-off-to-prison-after-failing-to-heed-final-drink-drive-warning/FQWUOLHJQNDZJFYVXIK5ED6WZY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-fisherman-darren-bevan-is-off-to-prison-after-failing-to-heed-final-drink-drive-warning/FQWUOLHJQNDZJFYVXIK5ED6WZY/ Tracy NealJudge: 'You have recently served a sentence of home detention and it did not deter you.' Tue, 15 Oct 2024 03:00:00 +0000 Fisherman Darren Bevan "chanced it" after sleeping in and driving his partner's car to the port to meet the fishing vessel he was due to leave on. Instead, he was caught drink-driving for the sixth time and is now in prison. Photo / 123RF
Health NZ chief writes to staff about ‘English-only’ memo, confirms directive also made at second hospital https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/health-nz-chief-writes-to-staff-about-english-only-memo-confirms-directive-also-made-at-second-hospital/ M5TYVFK2L5GFFPIG7NFFTXYT6QA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/health-nz-chief-writes-to-staff-about-english-only-memo-confirms-directive-also-made-at-second-hospital/ M5TYVFK2L5GFFPIG7NFFTXYT6QA/ Isaac Davison, Julia GabelThe language directive was also made at hospitals in Christchurch and Auckland. Tue, 15 Oct 2024 02:51:39 +0000 Health NZ chief executive Margie Apa (middle) said health staff were professionals and she trusted them to use their judgement when using non-English languages around patients. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Naenae fatal hit-and-run driver Harley Whaanga jailed for Anita Rani’s death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/naenae-fatal-hit-and-run-driver-harley-whaanga-jailed-for-anita-ranis-death/I3LW2PF5JNAWTPNBBPVUCBHHNQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/naenae-fatal-hit-and-run-driver-harley-whaanga-jailed-for-anita-ranis-death/I3LW2PF5JNAWTPNBBPVUCBHHNQ/ Melissa NightingaleThe victim's husband described his "helplessness" as his wife died in front of him. Tue, 15 Oct 2024 02:31:33 +0000 Harley Whaanga was jailed for killing Anita Rani on November 16 last year.
